sections.title: Signs You Need a Detox
sections.content:
• Unexplained fatigue or lethargy.
  • Constipation or bloating.
  • Skin rashes, acne, or dullness.
  • White coating on the tongue.
  • Difficulty losing weight.
  • Mental fog or irritability.

sections.title: The 3 Stages of our Detox
sections.content:
1. Mobilization

We use deep tissue massage and steam baths to loosen toxins stored in fat and muscle tissue.

2. Neutralization

Antioxidant-rich juices (like Ash Gourd, Green Juice) are given to bind with free radicals and toxins.

3. Elimination

We use Enemas, Colon Hydrotherapy, and Kidney packs to flush the toxins out of the body permanently.

sections.title: Key Therapies Included

faq.question: Will I feel weak during detox?
faq.answer: You might feel a 'healing crisis' (headache, fatigue) for the first 24-48 hours as caffeine/sugar withdrawal hits. After that, most patients report a surge in energy and clarity.

faq.question: How often should I detox?
faq.answer: We recommend a short 3-day detox at every change of season (Ritu Sandhi), and a deeper 7-10 day cleanse once a year.
